name: Fly the plane
description:
In "Fly the plane" you will fine a very simple and easy to play game.
The levels are generated fully randomly, giving the gameplay a unic experience each time.

In this game, you are in the control of a plane, the objetive is to get the farthest posible without getting the plane destroyed. The plane is destroyed when hits one of the elements of the level.

What to expect:

-Nice graphics during gameplay

-Graphics indicated for all audiences

-Increased difficulty over time

How to play:

-Left click mouse, hold to activate the engine, stop holding to deactivate and fall.
